message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value. I understand this product might be of particular interest to you given your expertise in [mention Bob's relevant expertise, if you have any]. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product at this stage, I assure you it's worth no less than $1500000 to me. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you as well. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1750000.  This price reflects the product's potential value and allows for a reasonable margin for both of us. Please let me know your decision by [date/time]. If you choose not to proceed, I have a backup buyer lined up who is ready to purchase it for $1500000.
